New_Bug.Bug_Name: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user
New_Bug.Description: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new the user, hence unable to create a new user in the application
New_Bug.Steps_to_Reproduce: 1)Login into the Application, 2)Navigate to the Users Menu -> New User, 3) Filled out all the user information fields, 4) Clicked on the ‘Save’ button, 5) Seen an error page"
New_Bug.Expected_Result: On clicking the SAVE button, you should be prompted to a successful message “New User has been created successfully”.
